pr_title: Reduce apitest harness' dependency on string matching

timeline.message:
Reduce apitest harness' dependency on string matching

- Pass list of supporting app names as enum vararg to scaffold setup.
- Use dispute agent type constants in RegisterDisputeAgentsTest case.

timeline.bodyText: I guess those constants would be good to have in the domain classes and maybe enums are even better.
timeline.author: chimp1984
